content.html: and how (legaly) does the MIT license combine with the "Terms of use", because as how i read them, they are conflicting. Making opensource harder to use doesn't help anybody. PS this has nothing to do with my opinion that Russia should surrender and leave Ukraine.
content.value:
and how (legaly) does the MIT license combine with the "Terms of use", because as how i read them, they are conflicting. 
Making opensource harder to use doesn't help anybody.  
PS this has nothing to do with my opinion that Russia should surrender and leave Ukraine.
